subject: Hockey, Ice
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: The Rangers blew a 2-0 lead, but they neutralized Alex Ovechkin and held on to even their opening-round playoff series against the Capitals at 2-2.
snippet: The Rangers blew a 2-0 lead, but they neutralized Alex Ovechkin and held on to even their opening-round playoff series against the Capitals at 2-2.
